I can remember listening to my parents' Beatles record over and over again.
I am single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
my parents both are school teachers.

participant_2.background:
I love to take my horse, Beauty, for rides on the weekends.
i am a great baker.
I love to read about holistic health and natural remedies, so my favorite websites are those that focus on these topics.
i am a house wife.
I like to spend time with my pets because it makes me feel young.

content.text: What's up friend?
Not much, just enjoying the day. How about you?
I'm doing good! I'm actually getting ready to go for a ride on my horse.
That sounds fun! I wish I could go riding with you.
Aw, maybe next time! I love riding horses. It's so relaxing and therapeutic.
I bet it is. I love animals, and horses are so beautiful.
They really are. I've had Beauty since she was a baby. We're best friends.
That's so sweet! I'm glad you have such a great companion.
Thanks! I'm pretty lucky.
Do you have any other pets?
I have a dog named Buddy and a cat named Mittens.
Oh, I love cats! They're so cute.
They are! I love animals in general. They're so much better than people!
Haha, I can't argue with that! I love animals too.
What are some of your favorite animals?
I love dogs, cats, horses, and rabbits.
Those are all great animals! I love rabbits too. They're so cute and fluffy.
They really are! I wish I could have a rabbit, but my husband is allergic.
Aww, that's too bad. They're such great pets.
Yeah, I know. I've always wanted one.
Maybe one day you'll be able to have one.
I hope so
